thread.title: Chancellor strips Johnson to seal Seahawks win
thread.title_full: Chancellor strips Johnson to seal Seahawks win

title: Chancellor strips Johnson to seal Seahawks win
text:
Kam Chancellor's strip of Calvin Johnson gives Seahawks 13-10 win over Lions Safety strips Lions WR Calvin Johnson near goal line to preserve 13-10 win. Post to Facebook Kam Chancellor's strip of Calvin Johnson gives Seahawks 13-10 win over Lions Safety strips Lions WR Calvin Johnson near goal line to preserve 13-10 win. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/1Lf9DU8 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 1 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Kam Chancellor's strip of Calvin Johnson gives Seahawks 13-10 win over Lions AP 11:39 p.m. EDT October 5, 2015 Seahawks S Kam Chancellor (31) punches the ball away from Lions WR Calvin Johnson. (Photo: Joe Nicholson, USA TODAY Sports) 1 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
SEATTLE (AP) â€” Kam Chancellor punched the ball free from Detroit wide receiver Calvin Johnson at the 1-yard line when it appeared the Lions were going to take the lead, and the Seattle Seahawks held on for a 13-10 win on Monday night. 
With Detroit on the verge of capping a 91-yard drive with the go-ahead touchdown with less than 2 minutes remaining, Chancellor came from the side and punched the ball from Johnson's arm as he was being tackled by Earl Thomas. The ball bounded into the end zone and went over the back line for a touchback and Seattle's ball at the 20. 
Russell Wilson was sacked six times and pulled numerous escape acts, but threw a TD pass to Doug Baldwin in the first half and Steven Hauschka hit a pair of field goals from 50-plus yards as Seattle evened its record at 2-2.
